languages.text: Навеки впившись в виски Идиры, зловещий имплант гемункула Тервантьяса наконец-то избавит ее от бесконечной кавалькады шепотков и кошмаров. Но что он заберет взамен?

Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?
languages.original_text: Навеки впившись в виски Идиры, зловещий имплант гемункула Тервантьяса наконец-то избавит ее от бесконечной кавалькады шепотков и кошмаров. Но что он заберет взамен?

traits.locale_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

languages.text: 血伶人特万提亚斯的植入物永远嵌在了伊迪拉的太阳穴里，终于让她彻底摆脱了永无休止的低语与噩梦，但她又要为此付出怎样的代价呢？
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

traits.locale_text: 血伶人特万提亚斯的植入物永远嵌在了伊迪拉的太阳穴里，终于让她彻底摆脱了永无休止的低语与噩梦，但她又要为此付出怎样的代价呢？

languages.text: Les sinistres implants de l'hémoncule Tervantias, irrémédiablement implantés dans les tempes d'Idira, vont enfin la débarrasser des voix et des cauchemars qui la tourmentent depuis toujours. Mais quel prix devra-t-elle payer ?
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

traits.locale_text: Les sinistres implants de l'hémoncule Tervantias, irrémédiablement implantés dans les tempes d'Idira, vont enfin la débarrasser des voix et des cauchemars qui la tourmentent depuis toujours. Mais quel prix devra-t-elle payer ?

languages.text: Este siniestro implante del Hemónculo Tervantias, engastado permanentemente en las sienes de Idira, por fin pondrá fin a sus susurros y pesadillas. Pero ¿qué le arrebatará a cambio?
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

traits.locale_text: Este siniestro implante del Hemónculo Tervantias, engastado permanentemente en las sienes de Idira, por fin pondrá fin a sus susurros y pesadillas. Pero ¿qué le arrebatará a cambio?

languages.text: イディラのこめかみに埋められた、ハモンキュラス・テルヴァンティアスの不吉なインプラントが、ついに彼女を悪夢の連鎖から解放する。しかし、彼女は見返りに何を求められるのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

traits.locale_text: イディラのこめかみに埋められた、ハモンキュラス・テルヴァンティアスの不吉なインプラントが、ついに彼女を悪夢の連鎖から解放する。しかし、彼女は見返りに何を求められるのだろうか？

languages.text: Für immer in Idiras Schläfen integriert wird das düstere Implantat des Haemonculus Tervantias sie endlich von den unaufhörlich flüsternden Stimmen und den ständigen Albträumen befreien. Doch was nimmt es ihr im Gegenzug?
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

traits.locale_text: Für immer in Idiras Schläfen integriert wird das düstere Implantat des Haemonculus Tervantias sie endlich von den unaufhörlich flüsternden Stimmen und den ständigen Albträumen befreien. Doch was nimmt es ihr im Gegenzug?

languages.text: Haimonkulus Tervantias'ın bu uğursuz implantı, İdira'nın şakağına sonsuza dek gömülü kalacak ve kadını dinmek bilmeyen o fısıltı ve kâbus yağmurundan nihayet kurtaracak. Peki ya karşılığında ondan ne götürecek?
languages.original_text: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?
